wikipedia_page.main: Richard Kenneth Oliver (born 14 November 1989) is an English cricketer who played for Worcestershire. He is a left-handed batsman who also bowls right-arm medium pace. He made his debut for the county on 16 May 2014 in the 2014 NatWest t20 Blast against Durham.He declined a new contract with Worcestershire in 2015. After a second spell with minor county Shropshire, he became captain of the Reigate Priory club in Surrey.

response: * Richard Oliver (field hockey) (born 1944), British Olympic hockey player
* Richard Oliver (Paralympian) (born 1955), Australian Paralympic athlete and wheelchair basketball player
* Richard Oliver (New Zealand politician) (1830–1910), New Zealand politician who represented Dunedin
* Richard Oliver (radical) (1735–1784), British merchant, plantation owner and politician
